title: Barenboim on Beethoven - Concerts 3 and 4
description:
Music Videos : Classical : DVD quality


In 2005, legendary pianist Daniel Barenboim performed the complete Beethoven piano sonatas over 8 concerts in 2 weeks at the Staatsoper in Berlin.

These definitive performances were lavishly filmed and beautifully produced to bring to the world these masterpieces in their entirety.


Concert 3:

Piano Sonata No. 8 in C Minor, Opus 13 - The Pathetique

Piano Sonata No. 12 in A Flat, Opus 26

Piano Sonata No. 25 in G, Opus 79

Piano Sonata No. 28 in A, Opus 101



Concert 4:

Piano Sonata No. 5 in C Minor, Opus 10 No. 1

Piano Sonata No. 11 in B Flat, Opus 22

Piano Sonata No. 19 in G Minor, Opus 49 No. 1

Piano Sonata No. 20 in G, Opus 49 No. 2

Piano Sonata No. 23 in F Minor, Opus 57 - The Appassionata
